name: Apple Wood Villas
detail: Nestled in the heart of the exclusive leafy suburbs of Karen, Applewood Villas provides an opportunity to buy into a unique development in a serene environment.

name: RiverRun Estates
detail: RiverRun Estates is a master-planned residence undertaken on a 100-acre parcel located in Ruiru, Kiambu County.

name: The Ridge
detail: The Ridge is a comprehensive and luxurious mixed-use residence located in Ridgeways, Nairobi approximately 10 km from the CBD.

name: Taraji Heights
detail: Taraji Heights is a comprehensive mixed-use residence where style, nature, community living and convenience meet.

name: The Alma
detail: he Alma is a comprehensive residential houses with  & impeccable finishing.

name: Situ Village
detail: Nestled in the scenic ravine of the Mbagathi and Ololua Ridges and with frontage to the Mbagathi River and Forest, Situ Village derives its name from this unique setup.
